TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DataGridViewHitTestType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies a location in a control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo> describes a coordinate pair on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control. The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo.Type%2A> property indicates which part of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> contains the point.
## Examples The following code example illustrates the use of this type. This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property reference topic.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewAutoSize#4](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.windows.forms.d_87_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewAutoSize#4](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.windows.forms.d_87_1.vb)]
